post.body: so does it look like ya all will have all week off of school?
Grandparents lunch tomorrow at 12:50. I will bring gram if you can take her home.
nope, stoppimg it all together... :)
I am having more than just caffeine withdrawls but I tend to drink a lot every day. Figure I need to get off of it!
I just started a scrabble game with you in the real scrabble... call me!
And I need a housekeeper as well... (As long as I am dreaming... I may as well dream big!) Love being back in town btw!
I was thinking I need the live in variety of chef... So I can eat dishes like torta rustica every night... ;)
I drove all over today (including to Redmond and back) ... it was fine. Just go slow and watch out for the yahoos!
still cold and snowy here... Very slick side roads.. Drive safe (and slow) tomorrow!
doesn't it sound wonderful, perhaps @thomas_ray could provide you with a recipe!
lol... You'll find the recipe at Costco! (For the salad) U should know better than to ask me for a recipe!
Youngest is now under the weather, I have a screaming headache, but Mac and Greg appear fine.
Thanks but I got it.
Perhaps @xolotl would like to speak at IgniteBend?
am still at lunch... Taking at least 1/2 hour
if you need something to do with your time, (instead of being a pest) there are piles of laundry at my house .. :)
I need a fax # that works, pls!
We can make it happen.
its cause when you are ahead I have to think, or because I was/am working yesterday and today... One or the other :)
odd to work or off to work... Its all the same thing...
Booting the computer, proofreading and grabt writing in front of the fire. I am so thankful I have the inside kinda job today!
Top o'the morning to you all... Looks stormy and cold here again... Huh.. Go figure! Their predictions were right.
Day three without dt coke is kicking my #*! . One would thing enough coffee would make up for it, but it doesn't appear to work that way!
RT @chrisbrogan Someone somewhere in Twitterland has the power and knowledge to help this boy! http://littlurl.com/rto0e
Reading The Jumping Frog by Twain ... Sitting in front of the fire with me doggies and my kindle.. Life is grand!
Have you read The War Prayer by Mark Twain? If you havnt ... You should.
Eating a ceasar salad while pretending its spinach and red pepper torta rustica... Its not working so well! Perhaps I need a chef?
If you feel like baking something but not delivering, dm me and I will play delivery boy.
Feel free to drop off goodies for these five guys any time during the day! Bus garage is off wilson ave.
Settling down for some soduku and then to read. Goodnight y'all.
Booting up one of the lab computers in order to run diagnostics...it is one unhappy computer.
Puddles all over in Bend... Wonder if the underpass is flooded yet? Watch out for deep sludge on side streets!
Expenses submitted, now to load the Lego board on the truck ... no small feat for a short girl with a 4 x 8 table!
Back to work...fairgrounds is locked today. Its a bit strange having to let myself in and out during the day!
Taking an honest lunch break so I can put in seven more hours...
Giving up on my lunch being delivered... going to find something...
Taking a break to play scrabble so @gwilliver will stop pestering... then back to work!
Hlafway done with work! Anyone want to bring me lunch?
Really wanting a wireless set of headphones for the iTouch.. do they make such an animal. I am NOT good at coords... keep strangling myself!
Am at work...getting nothing DONE! imagine that!
